name: Robert Mundell
institution: University of Chicago (1965-72) ,  University of Waterloo (1972-74) ,  Columbia University (1974 - present) ,  Chinese University of Hong Kong (2009 - present)
alma_mater: University of British Columbia, University of Washington, Massachusetts Institute of Technology
influenced: Rudi Dornbusch, Jacob Frenkel, Michael Mussa, Carmen Reinhart
contributions: Mundell-Fleming model, Optimum currency areas, Research on the gold standard
